name: Ghosts Invasion
description:
This is a small tower defense game involving little ghosts. They want to capture your heart!

Features:

  • 9 Levels (6 normal ones, 3 with some twists)
  • Original soundtrack
  • Cute(?) ghosts

Playtime: ~ 1 hour

Listen to the soundtrack here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2lMKrGWkJFQ

If you run into an error please tell me about it in the comments and what you did before. I'll try to fix it.
